entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
